<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="本文由来">本文由来<a class="anchor-link" href="#本文由来">¶</a></h1><p>本文始自<a href="http://www.loyhome.com/python%E5%B0%8F%E8%AF%95/">落园</a>的一篇博文。作者也不知哪儿弄来一个题目。</p>
<p>现在智商严重退化，用了半天才理解了作者的算法。更关键的是，作者声称是python新手，模仿R写的算法，写起来没有on the fly的感觉。这也很正常，因为这是模仿的、又是新手，所以就哪里会体现出pythonic呢！可问题是，我又了好长时间，也没能想出来应该如何改进，由此可见，我这python水平始终停留在表面阶段，还是要下苦功啊。最后更更关键的问题是，总觉得这算法有点问题，用小字符串测试来去又总是对的，推敲来推敲去，发现了更多的python细节问题。</p>
<p>因此本文下面主要是记录一些：</p>
<ul>
<li>我已经知道，但是却没有时常注意的细节，所以经常会错了而不自知。   </li>
<li>一些从该程序中发现、我应该知道、却从来没有注意到的细节。  </li>
<li>一些引申出来的细节。</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>因此声明：本文完全不是评价原作者算法（我很喜欢作者的博客，作者的算法也很好），而本文只是自己巩固基础知识。</strong></p>
<h4 id="题目：">题目：<a class="anchor-link" href="#题目：">¶</a></h4><ul>
<li>给定一个输入字符串，找出最漂亮的无重复子字符串。</li>
<li>子字符串：从原字符串中减掉某些字符可得到的。</li>
<li>无重复字符串：没有重复的字符</li>
<li>甲比乙漂亮：甲的长度>乙，或者甲的字典排序在乙之前。<code>（Way：其实我在这里一直没理解 'a' 和 'b' 谁的字典顺序在前，也没搜着相关资料）</code></li>
</ul>
<h4 id="落园里给出的答案如下：">落园里给出的答案如下：<a class="anchor-link" href="#落园里给出的答案如下：">¶</a></h4><p><code>Way: 程序里的注释是我自己加的，为了避免混淆，原作者的注释全删除。</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'nlhthgrfdnnlprjtecpdrthigjoqdejsfkasoctjijaoebqlrgaiakfsbljmpibkidjsrtkgrdnqsknbarpabgokbsrfhmeklrle'</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="n">x_split</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="n">unique_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_split</span><span class="p">));</span>
<span class="n">unique_x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reverse</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">x_remain</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">();</span>
<span class="n">current_string</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x_split</span>
<span class="n">current_unique</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">unique_x</span>
<span class="n">current_order</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">unique_x</span>
<span class="k">while</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_remain</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">unique_x</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">character</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">current_order</span><span class="p">:</span>                              <span class="c1">#way:位置1</span>
        <span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">current_string</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">character</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="n">sub_string</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">current_string</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_string</span><span class="p">)];</span>  <span class="c1">#way:位置2</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_string</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sub_string</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">):</span>        <span class="c1">#way:位置3</span>
            <span class="n">x_remain</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">character</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sub_string</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">count</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">character</span><span class="p">)):</span>
                <span class="n">sub_string</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">remove</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">character</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="n">current_string</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sub_string</span><span class="p">;</span>
            <span class="n">current_unique</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_string</span><span class="p">));</span>
            <span class="n">current_unique</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reverse</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="n">current_order</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">current_unique</span><span class="p">;</span>                      <span class="c1">#way:位置4</span>
            <span class="k">break</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_remain</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">''</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_remain</span><span class="p">))</span>  <span class="c1">#Way：这是我加的</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>['t', 's', 'o', 'c', 'r', 'p', 'k', 'i', 'j', 'g', 'd', 'q', 'n', 'b', 'a', 'f', 'h', 'm', 'l', 'e']
tsocrpkijgdqnbafhmle
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="再次声明：">再次声明：<a class="anchor-link" href="#再次声明：">¶</a></h1><p>我很喜欢作者的博客，作者的这个算法也完全没有问题。本文也完全不是要评价落园的这篇算法，只是借来巩固自己的基础。</p>
<h1 id="要点">要点<a class="anchor-link" href="#要点">¶</a></h1><h2 id="一、list-的深复制、浅复制、值、引用的问题">一、list 的深复制、浅复制、值、引用的问题<a class="anchor-link" href="#一、list-的深复制、浅复制、值、引用的问题">¶</a></h2><p>现在依稀记得当年上 C 语言课程的时候，老师在课堂上反复地讲的、习题上反复作的、考试一定不放过的一个内容是数组的下标和越界问题，另一个就是值和引用的问题。用在这里差不多就是所谓的深复制、浅复制的问题。</p>
<p>深复制、浅复制是现在手头的一本Python参考手册上面的用语，各种教材、网上各种资料用语还不一样。英文资料上面的说法也不太一样。</p>
<h4 id="1.-=-操作传递的是引用，append、remove是在当前序列上进行的操作">1. = 操作传递的是引用，append、remove是在当前序列上进行的操作<a class="anchor-link" href="#1.-=-操作传递的是引用，append、remove是在当前序列上进行的操作">¶</a></h4><p>对序列的 = 操作传递的是引用，对其中一个序列的修改同时影响另一个序列。
这一点比较简单，放在这里只为完整性。</p>
<h4 id="2.-浅复制：对值元素传递值、对引用元素传递引用。如copy">2. 浅复制：对值元素传递值、对引用元素传递引用。如copy<a class="anchor-link" href="#2.-浅复制：对值元素传递值、对引用元素传递引用。如copy">¶</a></h4><p>例如：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">copy</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">]]</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span>             <span class="c1"># = 操作传递的是引用</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># 1、2、3传递的是值，[6、7]传递的是引用</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>     <span class="c1"># b的append操作不影响a、n</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># b[3]的操作影响a、n</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">]</span>      <span class="c1"># = 操作不是在原序列上的操作。好了，再整多了把自己绕进去了。</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[1, 2, 3, [6, 7], 4] [1, 2, 3, [6, 7], 4] [1, 2, 3, [6, 7], 5]
[1, 2, 3, [6, 7, 8, 9], 4] [1, 2, 3, [6, 7, 8, 9], 4] [1, 2, 3, [6, 7, 8, 9], 5]
[1, 2, 3, [6, 7, 8, 9, 10], 4] [1, 2, 3, [6, 7, 8, 9, 10], 4] [1, 2, 3, ['b'], 5]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="3.-*-操作生成的是序列的副本，属浅复制，类似上面的copy操作">3. * 操作生成的是序列的副本，属浅复制，类似上面的copy操作<a class="anchor-link" href="#3.-*-操作生成的是序列的副本，属浅复制，类似上面的copy操作">¶</a></h4><p>例如：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">4</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">4</span>
<span class="n">c</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">n</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)]</span>         <span class="c1"># 比较 c、d 操作与 b</span>
<span class="n">d</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">j</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3]
[[1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3]]
[[1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3]]
[[1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3]]
[1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3]
[[0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3]]
[[0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3], [0, 2, 3]]
[[1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3]]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="4.-deepcopy-操行的是深复制">4. deepcopy 操行的是深复制<a class="anchor-link" href="#4.-deepcopy-操行的是深复制">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="二、在遍历序列的同时修改序列">二、在遍历序列的同时修改序列<a class="anchor-link" href="#二、在遍历序列的同时修改序列">¶</a></h2><p>前面说到，后来总觉得算法似乎有点问题，是因为回忆起来有一篇文章讲过，在遍历的同时个性list要非常谨慎，因为会出问题。但是落园很巧妙地这样使用没有问题。</p>
<p>在<code>位置4</code>那儿，<code>current_string</code>的重新赋值，不讨论内在开销之类的问题，显然用 <code>current_string.remove(character)</code>会直观一些，但是这样用，就会有真正的问题，也就是在遍历的同时修改了序列，遍历会跳过某些元素。下面有例子。</p>
<p>下面一段例子是后来测试出来的，原因大概也是值和引用的问题。在原序列上的修改会影响遍历，而将变量指向新的序列或者新的地址，不会影响遍历。例子如下：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="1.-第一个例子：">1. 第一个例子：<a class="anchor-link" href="#1.-第一个例子：">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'abcd'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">c</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'第</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1">遍循环时 c=</span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">   n=</span><span class="si">{2}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:]</span>       <span class="c1">#n被指向了新的地址，但原地址数据不变，因此c仍然会照预期地遍历下去</span>
    <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">+=</span><span class="mi">1</span>          
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>第1遍循环时 c=a   n=['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']
第2遍循环时 c=b   n=['b', 'c', 'd']
第3遍循环时 c=c   n=['c', 'd']
第4遍循环时 c=d   n=['d']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>在上面的例子当中，切片对象传递的是值，估计也是浅复制的范畴。落园也是用类似这种方式遍历<code>（位置1、位置4）</code>，能够按照预期地遍历下去，同时还不影响while循环里的下一遍遍历。但是该地址上的数据引用数据会不会变成0被垃圾回收，并被覆盖新的数据，产生不可预测的结果呢？这个测试起来比较麻烦，后面再说。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="2.-第二个例子：">2. 第二个例子：<a class="anchor-link" href="#2.-第二个例子：">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'abcd'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">c</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'第</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1">遍循环时 c=</span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">   n=</span><span class="si">{2}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">remove</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">)</span>      <span class="c1">#n被在原地址上修改了，遍历跳过了一个元素（但没跳过地址）。</span>
    <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">+=</span><span class="mi">1</span>   
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>第1遍循环时 c=a   n=['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']
第2遍循环时 c=c   n=['b', 'c', 'd']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>下面通过打印切片后对象的id 查看地址，验证一下切片的浅复制吧：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>106602632 106632136
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">]]</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]))</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]))</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]))</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'a'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="nb">id</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>106603016
106603016
106603016
106633800
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>再来一个复杂一点的例子：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'a'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]]</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'c'</span>           <span class="c1">#n[2]指向新的位置，但a[1]仍指向原位置的数据</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>            <span class="c1">#因此a不变</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'a'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]]</span>
<span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'c'</span>        <span class="c1">#在原位置上修改，因此 a 也发生改变</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>['b', [1, 2]]
['b', ['c', 2]]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>下面遍历复杂序列。</p>
<p>经过多次修改、测试之后决定放弃了。分别在对n、n1、n2遍历的时候，对n、n1、n2进行修改，再对其打印，产生各种结果，太复杂的懒得总结了，反正自己也记不住，反而越来越乱。有兴趣的同志自己测试去吧。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">copy</span>
<span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'a'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]]</span>
<span class="n">n2</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">n3</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">c</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">n2</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">n2</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'d'</span>
    <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'e'</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>a ['a', 'b', [1, 2]]
b ['a', 'b', ['e', 2]]
['e', 2] ['a', 'b', ['e', 2]]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="三、切片的上下标问题（补充：其实是开始和结束的索引，不是正常的上下标概念）">三、切片的上下标问题（补充：其实是开始和结束的索引，不是正常的上下标概念）<a class="anchor-link" href="#三、切片的上下标问题（补充：其实是开始和结束的索引，不是正常的上下标概念）">¶</a></h2><p>这个问题以前想当年看书的时候测试过，但是没有记下来，后来又忘记了（现在智商和记忆力怎么退化这么多呢？）这里再记下来吧。</p>
<p>问题源自源代码的<code>位置2</code>，作者用了 <code>sub_string = current_string[index:len(current_string)]</code>，这样丝毫没有问题，简化成 <code>sub_string = current_string[index:]</code> 也没有问题，但也没什么意义，除了少敲几个字符。</p>
<p>但是问题是：我不知哪里来的直觉总是觉得 <code>a[1:2]</code>应该是包含 <code>a[1]</code>、<code>a[2]</code> 两个元素的，但其实是只包含 <code>a[1]</code> 一个元素的。</p>
<p>所以对于一个len(a)=3的序列，a[3]会越界，但a[0:3]没有问题，并且包含了所有的元素，甚至可以a[0:8]；a的最后一个元素是a[2]，但是a[0:2]会漏掉最后一个元素。</p>
<p>简单来说就是切片是包含上标、不包含下标的，这其实是太简单的常识。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'abc'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#print a[3]  越界，抛出异常</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[1:]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:])</span>   <span class="c1">#bc</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[1:2]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="c1">#b</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[1:3]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="c1">#bc</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[1:8]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="c1">#bc</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>a[1:]= ['b', 'c']
a[1:2]= ['b']
a[1:3]= ['b', 'c']
a[1:8]= ['b', 'c']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>负数下标基本上也是上面的思路：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">a</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'abc'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#print a[-8]  #越界，抛出异常</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[:-1]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>   <span class="c1">#ab</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[-1:2]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:])</span>  <span class="c1">#c</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[-2:3]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:])</span>  <span class="c1">#bc</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'a[-8:8]='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">:])</span>  <span class="c1">#abc</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>a[:-1]= ['a', 'b']
a[-1:2]= ['c']
a[-2:3]= ['b', 'c']
a[-8:8]= ['a', 'b', 'c']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="四、set-的操作">四、<em>set</em> 的操作<a class="anchor-link" href="#四、set-的操作">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>集合是唯一项的无序集</li>
<li>集合不提供索引或切片操作</li>
<li>放入集合的项目是不可变的</li>
</ul>
<p>没有太多可说的，直接看例子吧。唯一注意的一就是“减”操作。也就是 <code>位置3</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ab'</span><span class="p">)</span>   <span class="c1">#可以初始化为 set('ab') 或者 set(['a','b']), 但不能是 set('a','b')</span>
<span class="n">abc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'abc'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">ab</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">abc</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ab_abc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ab</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">abc</span>   <span class="c1">#注意“减”操作的前后顺序</span>
<span class="n">abc_ab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">abc</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">ab</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'after -: '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ab_abc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">abc_ab</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ab_abc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ab</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="n">abc</span>
<span class="n">abc_ab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">abc</span> <span class="o">^</span> <span class="n">ab</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'after ^: '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ab_abc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">abc_ab</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ab_abc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ab</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">abc</span>
<span class="n">abc_ab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">abc</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">ab</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'after |: '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ab_abc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">abc_ab</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ab_abc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ab</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="n">abc</span>
<span class="n">abc_ab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">abc</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="n">ab</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s1">'after &: '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ab_abc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">abc_ab</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>{'a', 'b'} {'a', 'b', 'c'}
after -:  set() {'c'}
after ^:  {'c'} {'c'}
after |:  {'a', 'b', 'c'} {'a', 'b', 'c'}
after &:  {'a', 'b'} {'a', 'b'}
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="五、测试一下上面提到的数据覆盖问题">五、测试一下上面提到的数据覆盖问题<a class="anchor-link" href="#五、测试一下上面提到的数据覆盖问题">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">gc</span>
<span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">n</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">20000</span><span class="p">)]</span>  <span class="c1">#这里应该是在新分配的地址上，原地址的数据不变，理论上不影响 n 的遍历</span>
    <span class="n">result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>                      <span class="c1">#所以 result 应该与最初的 x 相等。</span>
    <span class="n">gc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">collect</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">)])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>True
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>貌似没有覆盖的问题，所以 n 仍然在原来的数据地址上老老实实地、安全的遍历着。上面的程序运行的很慢，本来就是希望有很大的内存读写，所以内存开销上面的优化也没有意义，或许可以进行其它的优化。</p>
<p>这只是个大概，也不是最终结论，再复杂的测试一时也想不出来了，也懒得弄了。干正事去了……</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    mathjaxscript.type = 'text/javascript';
    mathjaxscript.src = '//cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML';
    mathjaxscript[(window.opera ? "innerHTML" : "text")] =
        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +
        "    config: ['MMLorHTML.js']," +
        "    TeX: { extensions: ['AMSmath.js','AMSsymbols.js','noErrors.js','noUndefined.js'], equationNumbers: { autoNumber: 'AMS' } }," +
        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +
        "    displayAlign: 'center'," +
        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +
        "    tex2jax: { " +
        "        inlineMath: [ ['$','$'] ], " +
        "        displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'] ]," +

entry.content:
This a test for latex plugin of pelican

now is an inline math equations $ y = x^2 $

and a display math:

$$ y = x^2 $$

and another type:

\begin{equation} y=x^2 \end{equation}
\begin{equation} \label{second} y=x^2 \end{equation}

now ref to the second as second $ \ref{second} $
